db:abstract.db:para: The QMediaResource class provides a description of a media resource.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A media resource is composed of a URL containing the location of the resource and a set of properties that describe the format of the resource. The properties provide a means to assess a resource without first attempting to load it, and in situations where media be represented by multiple alternative representations provide a means to select the appropriate resource.

Media made available by a remote services can often be available in multiple encodings or quality levels, this allows a client to select an appropriate resource based on considerations such as codecs supported, network bandwidth, and display constraints. QMediaResource includes information such as the MIME type, audio and video codecs, audio and video bit rates, and resolution so these constraints and others can be evaluated.
The only mandatory property of a QMediaResource is the url().

db:section.db:title: QMediaResource::QMediaResource()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a null media resource.

db:section.db:title: QMediaResource::QMediaResource(const QNetworkRequest &request, const QString &mimeType = QString())
db:section.db:para: Constructs a media resource with the given mimeType from a network request.

db:section.db:title: QMediaResource::QMediaResource(const QUrl &url, const QString &mimeType = QString())
db:section.db:para: Constructs a media resource with the given mimeType from a url.

db:section.db:title: QMediaResource::QMediaResource(const QMediaResource &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of a media resource other.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QMediaResource::~QMediaResource()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a media resource.

db:section.db:title: int QMediaResource::audioBitRate() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the bit rate in bits per second of a media resource's audio stream.
This may be zero if the bit rate is unknown, or the resource contains no audio stream.

db:section.db:title: QString QMediaResource::audioCodec() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the audio codec of a media resource.
This may be null if the media resource does not contain an audio stream, or the codec is unknown.

db:section.db:title: int QMediaResource::channelCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of audio channels in a media resource.
This may be zero if the sample size is unknown, or the resource contains no audio stream.

db:section.db:title: qint64 QMediaResource::dataSize() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the size in bytes of a media resource.
This may be zero if the size is unknown.

db:section.db:title: bool QMediaResource::isNull() const
db:section.db:para: Identifies if a media resource is null.
Returns true if the resource is null, and false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: QString QMediaResource::language() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the language of a media resource as an ISO 639-2 code.
This may be null if the language is unknown.

db:section.db:title: QString QMediaResource::mimeType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the MIME type of a media resource.
This may be null if the MIME type is unknown.

db:section.db:title: QNetworkRequest QMediaResource::request() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the network request associated with this media resource.

db:section.db:title: QSize QMediaResource::resolution() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the resolution in pixels of a media resource.
This may be null is the resolution is unknown, or the resource contains no pixel data (i.e. the resource is an audio stream.

db:section.db:title: int QMediaResource::sampleRate() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the audio sample rate of a media resource.
This may be zero if the sample size is unknown, or the resource contains no audio stream.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setAudioBitRate(int rate)
db:section.db:para: Sets the bit rate in bits per second of a media resource's video stream.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setAudioCodec(const QString &codec)
db:section.db:para: Sets the audio codec of a media resource.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setChannelCount(int channels)
db:section.db:para: Sets the number of audio channels in a media resource.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setDataSize(const qint64 size)
db:section.db:para: Sets the size in bytes of a media resource.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setLanguage(const QString &language)
db:section.db:para: Sets the language of a media resource.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setResolution(const QSize &resolution)
db:section.db:para: Sets the resolution in pixels of a media resource.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setResolution(int width, int height)
db:section.db:para: Sets the width and height in pixels of a media resource.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setSampleRate(int sampleRate)
db:section.db:para: Sets the audio sampleRate of a media resource.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setVideoBitRate(int rate)
db:section.db:para: Sets the bit rate in bits per second of a media resource's video stream.

db:section.db:title: void QMediaResource::setVideoCodec(const QString &codec)
db:section.db:para: Sets the video codec of media resource.

db:section.db:title: QUrl QMediaResource::url() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the URL of a media resource.

db:section.db:title: int QMediaResource::videoBitRate() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the bit rate in bits per second of a media resource's video stream.
This may be zero if the bit rate is unknown, or the resource contains no video stream.

db:section.db:title: QString QMediaResource::videoCodec() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the video codec of a media resource.
This may be null if the media resource does not contain a video stream, or the codec is unknonwn.

db:section.db:title: bool QMediaResource::operator!=(const QMediaResource &other) const
db:section.db:para: Compares a media resource to other.
Returns true if they are different, and false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: QMediaResource &QMediaResource::operator=(const QMediaResource &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns the value of other to a media resource.

db:section.db:title: bool QMediaResource::operator==(const QMediaResource &other) const
db:section.db:para: Compares a media resource to other.
Returns true if the resources are identical, and false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: QMediaResourceList
db:section.db:para: Synonym for QList<QMediaResource>
